SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication

Class ResponseServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.communication.ResponseServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
RMIRespondServer, TCPServer
public abstract class ResponseServer extends Object
Class that implements methods to answer a client request and implements the ServerCommunication notifications interface

  • Constructor Details

    • ResponseServer

      public ResponseServer(Lobby lobby, String sharedLock)
      Create a RespondServer. Its use is to implement methods to answer a client request.
      Parameters:
      lobby - lobby shared between RespondServers
      sharedLock - shared lock on lobby, controllerProvider, playController, chatController between RespondServers

    • getPlayerNameFromClient

      protected abstract String getPlayerNameFromClient(Object client)
      Get name of a playing client form his connection
      Parameters:
      client - client object. A cast is needed
      Returns:
      client's nickname. Return null if client is not in game
